pageProps.content:
# Shopify 串接百雷

###### tags: `draft`

- https://github.com/MONEI/Shopify-api-node e.response.body 錯誤要從 got Error 拿 = =
- Storefront graphql 欄位和 admin api 不相容
    - 請實際玩玩！
    - https://shopify.dev/graphiql/storefront-graphiql
    - https://shopify.dev/tools/graphiql-admin-api

Metafield 來做資料儲存（但沒辦法 query 的）

- https://community.shopify.com/c/Shopify-Discussion/Query-all-products-with-a-given-metafield-value/td-p/651540 (可撥)
- https://community.shopify.com/c/Shopify-APIs-SDKs/Why-are-custom-fields-so-difficult-to-manage-in-Shopify/td-p/534484 （理由伯）
pageProps.title: Shopify 串接百雷
